meanings.definition: To persist in existence or in a course of action.
meanings.sent1: She kept continuing to study even when it was hard.
meanings.sent2: The river keeps continuing to flow day and night.
meanings.sent3: The cat continued to chase the laser pointer, not realizing it was a game.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music continued like a never-ending melody.
meanings.sent5: The sun continuing to rise each morning is a beautiful sight.

meanings.sent1: The continuing rain made the roads slippery.
meanings.sent2: Her continuing dedication to her work is admirable.
meanings.sent3: The continuing rain turned the picnic into an indoor party.
meanings.sent4: The continuing waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The continuing laughter from the children filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Continuing to be in a specified state or condition.
meanings.sent1: The cake was delicious, with its continuing sweetness.
meanings.sent2: His continuing smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The continuing warmth of the fireplace made the room cozy.
meanings.sent4: The continuing growth of the plants showed a green thumb.
meanings.sent5: The continuing success of the team brought them closer together.
